h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you see pretend to vanish but reappear in the same spot, be ready for two clones to appear on either side of him, and they'll all toss their chakram wheels at you all at once that can be difficult to evade quickly.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you see pretend to vanish but reappear in the same spot, be ready for two clones to appear on either side of him, and they'll all toss their chakram wheels at you all at once that can be difficult to evade quickly.
